Feelings

16 Aug 2021

Lol, I sent this to space a few years ago and just found it in an old file.

“This note was sent to space on Asgardia’s first satellite. Van Dou Wes (Ivan Douwes) Born 09/09/1978 This public key will become active in 2020 for access to my digital estate. It should not be hard to find, along with the place to enter the key. qU&)bZ~<r:Y|’)VN?6e!?^Vt+/ZzTT”

If you’re reading this.. you’re here!! :)
